author: Samuel Osborne, Samuel Osborne
title: Coronavirus: Chinese officials told not to 'conceal' new cases as Hubei province eases lockdown
description: No new locally transmitted infections reported
content:
Local officials in China have been urged not to conceal new coronavirus cases after a drop in new Covid-19 infections led to the easing of a two-month lockdown in Hubei province.
The epicentre of the outbreak will allow healthy people to leave, the provincia… [+1711 chars]
